{
    "Course_Proposal_Form": {
        "null": [
            "Title: Storytelling and Storyboarding with Generative AI",
            "Organization: Tertiary Infotech Pte. Ltd.",
            "Learning Outcomes:",
            "LO1: Use generative AI techniques to develop compelling script elements enriched with narrative structure and creative storytelling.",
            "LO2: Identify effective prompt terms and narrative components to enhance AI-generated storyboards for visual storytelling.",
            "LO3: Utilise generative AI tools to refine video scripts for clarity, tone, and narrative consistency.",
            "LO4: Analyse generative AI outputs for ethical issues, bias, and copyright risks, applying appropriate corrective actions.",
            "Course Duration: 2 days (16 hrs)",
            "Total Course Hours: 16 hrs",
            "Total Instructional Hours: 14 hrs",
            "Total Assessment Hours: 2 hr",
            "Instructional Methods:",
            "Interactive Presentation (14 hrs)",
            "Brainstorming",
            "Demonstration",
            "Drill and Practice",
            "Assessment Methods:",
            "Written Exam (1 hr)",
            "Practical Exam (1 hr)",
            "TSC Mapping:",
            "TSC Title: AI Content Generation for Script Development",
            "TSC Code: MED-MED-3004-1.1",
            "TSC Knowledge:",
            "K1: AI-generated script ideation techniques for world-building, storyline and character development, scenario iterations",
            "K2: Copyright law covering Gen AI usage",
            "K3: Gen AI tool limitations and solutions",
            "K4: Awareness and correction of bias in LLMs training data reproduced in output",
            "K5: Best Practices to minimise plagiarism risk",
            "K6: AI tools for script analysis and market research",
            "K7: Gen AI and Ethics awareness",
            "K8: Basic Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques and tools relevant to AI Text generation",
            "K9: Creative principles and storytelling in AI generated text prompts",
            "K10: Basic AI algorithms and models used in script/text generation",
            "TSC Abilities:",
            "A1: Analyse AI output for bias and taking corrective steps",
            "A2: Utilise NLP techniques and tools to enhance the quality and effectiveness of AI-generated story elements",
            "A3: Apply ethical considerations in the selection of prompts and reference usage",
            "A4: Filter and Script-edit Gen-AI output",
            "A5: Use AI-generated text techniques and methodologies to develop script elements",
            "A6: Apply and adjust relevant prompts in the generative process to improve iterations",
            "A7: Identify key terms and themes for input into Gen AI platform to ideate and iterate story elements for incorporation into text prompts",
            "A8: Incorporate unique creative principles and storytelling elements into AI-generated story ideas to avoid generic replication",
            "A9: Identify copyright risk in Gen-AI production and avoid copyright infringement",
            "Learning Units"
        ],
        "LU1: Storytelling with Generative AI (K9, K10, A8, A5)": [
            "Topic 1: Fundamentals of storytelling (K9)",
            "Topic 2: Basic AI models for script generation (K10)",
            "Topic 3: Storytelling and storyboarding with generative AI (A8)",
            "Topic 4: Generating stories with generative AI (A5)"
        ],
        "LU2: Storyboarding with Generative AI (K1, K3, A7, A6)": [
            "Topic 1: Fundamentals of storyboarding (K1)",
            "Topic 2: Storyboard breakdown and text prompts for images (A7)",
            "Topic 3: AI tool limitation and solutions to generate better images (K3)",
            "Topic 4: Apply iterative approach to image generation (A6)"
        ],
        "LU3: Creating AI Generated Video (K8, K6, A2, A4)": [
            "Topic 1: AI Video tools for generating text, voiceover and video (K8, A2)",
            "Topic 2: Generating AI video for storyboard (K6, A4)"
        ],
        "LU4: Generative AI Ethics and Best Practices (K7, K5, K4, K2, A3, A1, A9)": [
            "Topic 1: Gen AI and ethics awareness (K7)",
            "Topic 2: Best Practices to minimise plagiarism risk (K5, A3)",
            "Topic 3: Analyse AI output for bias and taking corrective steps (K4, A1)",
            "Topic 4: Copyright risk and avoid copyright infringement (K2, A9)"
        ]
    }
}
